description: Insert @link@ to images/docs with hover preview and confirm-on-paste.
config.title: DocuSnap
config.assetsDir.desc: Directory to store inserted images/docs. Can be relative to workspace or absolute path.
config.overridePaste.desc: When enabled, override Ctrl+V in editor with confirm-on-paste (@link@).
config.verboseLog.desc: Emit more detailed debug logs (candidate samples, per-file scanning, deletion details, etc.). Usually keep off.
config.commentTokenMap.desc: Map of file extensions to line comment tokens (used for inserting @link@ and limiting search scope).
submenu.title: DocuSnap
category.title: DocuSnap
